textBeforeTable: Employment estimate and mean wage estimates for this occupation: National estimates for this occupation: Top National estimates for this occupation Industry profile for this occupation State profile for this occupation Metropolitan area profile for this occupation Occupational Employment and Wages, November 2003 53-2011 Airline Pilots, Copilots, and Flight Engineers Pilot and navigate the flight of multi-engine aircraft in regularly scheduled service for the transport of passengers and cargo. Requires Federal Air Transport rating and certification in specific aircraft type used. Include aircraft instructors with similar certification. Occupational Employment Statistics U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics
